about_the_game:
You are waiting for an exciting adventure in a metropolis, where the main character - a cat named Philip - is forced to survive, exploring the city's nooks and crannies and scavenging through garbage dumps in search of food. Life in the city is full of dangers and surprises, but Philip is not one to give up.

One day, after a heart-to-heart talk with his faithful friend, a beaver named Bob, Philip decides to change his fate. Bob tells him about a mysterious secret stash that hides the most delicious food in this world. Inspired by this story, Philip embarks on a dangerous and exciting journey to find the cherished stash.

But the path to his dream will not be easy. Evil wolves, who are also hunting for the stash, are ready to do anything to prevent Philip. You will have to help our hero avoid traps, bypass enemies and overcome all obstacles on the way to the goal.

Features:

Runner Gameplay: Sprint through the city, avoiding obstacles.
Fall Acceleration: Speed up your descent.
Dynamic Environments: Explore diverse cityscapes.
Dangerous Enemies: Evade wolves and threats.
Collectibles: Find items and power-ups.
Engaging Story: Uncover Philip's adventure with Bob.

name: CATRUN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP, 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Dual Core 2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: XP, 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Dual Core 2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

short_description: Join Philip the cat in CATRUN, an exhilarating runner game set in a bustling city. Help Philip avoid wolves, navigate tricky obstacles, and use fall acceleration to speed through challenges. Explore dynamic environments, collect power-ups, and uncover a heartfelt story of adventure and friendship.
